scripts.scss: node-sass --source-map-embed  src/scss/main.scss dist/css/main.css && npm run postcss
scripts.start: npm run dist && npm run watch & live-server --watch='dist'
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && csso dist/css/main.css dist/css/main.css
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/css && cp -R src/{assets,CNAME,index.html,favicon.ico,andrius-kvedaras-cv.pdf} dist
scripts.build: npm run dist && npm run build:css
